channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Wp-D3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Wp-D3

item.title: CVE-2023-0536|2024-08-02T05:17:49.594Z -- unknown -- wp-d3
item.description: The Wp-D3 WordPress plugin through 2.4.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
